languages.text: "Никому ни с места, именем Наместника!" {n}Тощий бледнокожий мужчина в замызганной клерикальной робе окидывает вас взглядом — и тут же подобострастно падает на колени.{/n} "Ваше высокородие! Простите мою горячность, сиятельн{mf|ый|ая} {name} — никак не ожидал столкнуться со столь высокими особами в этом углу Футфола!"

traits.locale_text: "Никому ни с места, именем Наместника!" {n}Тощий бледнокожий мужчина в замызганной клерикальной робе окидывает вас взглядом — и тут же подобострастно падает на колени.{/n} "Ваше высокородие! Простите мою горячность, сиятельн{mf|ый|ая} {name} — никак не ожидал столкнуться со столь высокими особами в этом углу Футфола!"

languages.text: "Stop right there, in the name of the Liege!" {n}The gaunt, pale-skinned man in grimy clerical robes glances at you — and immediately falls to his knees obsequiously.{/n} "Your Excellency! Please forgive my vehemence, most noble {name} — I never expected to encounter such eminent persons in this corner of Footfall!"
languages.original_text: "Никому ни с места, именем Наместника!" {n}Тощий бледнокожий мужчина в замызганной клерикальной робе окидывает вас взглядом — и тут же подобострастно падает на колени.{/n} "Ваше высокородие! Простите мою горячность, сиятельн{mf|ый|ая} {name} — никак не ожидал столкнуться со столь высокими особами в этом углу Футфола!"

traits.locale_text: "Freeze, in the name of the Liege!" {n}The gaunt, pale-skinned man in grimy clerical robes glances at you — and immediately falls to his knees obsequiously.{/n} "Your Excellency! Please forgive my vehemence, the most noble {name} — I never expected to meet such eminent persons in this corner of Footfall!"

Please forgive my vehemence, the most noble {name} — I never expected to meet such eminent persons in this corner of Footfall!"

"Stop right there, in the name of the Liege!" {n}The gaunt, pale-skinned man in grimy clerical robes glances at you — and immediately falls to his knees obsequiously.{/n} "Your Excellency! Please forgive my vehemence, most noble {name} — I never expected to encounter such eminent persons in this corner of Footfall!"

"Stop right there, in the name of the Liege!" {n}The gaunt, pale-skinned man in grimy clerical robes glances at you — and immediately falls to his knees obsequiously.{/n} "Your Excellency! Please forgive my vehemence, most noble {name} — I never expected to encounter such eminent persons in this corner of Footfall!"

"Stop right there, in the name of the Liege!" {n}The gaunt, pale-skinned man in grimy clerical robes glances at you — and immediately falls to his knees obsequiously.{/n} "Your Excellency! Please forgive my vehemence, most noble {name} — I never expected to encounter such eminent persons in this corner of Footfall!"

languages.text: “以总督的名义，住口吧！”{n}这个面容憔悴、皮肤苍白、身穿阴暗教士长袍的人瞥了你一眼，之后立刻谄媚地跪在地上。{/n}“大人！最尊贵的{name}大人，请原谅我的义愤！我从来没想到会在落脚港这种地方遇到像您这么煊赫的人！”
languages.original_text: "Stop right there, in the name of the Liege!" {n}The gaunt, pale-skinned man in grimy clerical robes glances at you — and immediately falls to his knees obsequiously.{/n} "Your Excellency! Please forgive my vehemence, most noble {name} — I never expected to encounter such eminent persons in this corner of Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: “以总督的名义，住口吧！”{n}这个面容憔悴、皮肤苍白、身穿阴暗教士长袍的人瞥了你一眼，之后立刻谄媚地跪在地上。{/n}“大人！最尊贵的{name}大人，请原谅我的义愤！我从来没想到会在落脚港这种地方遇到像您这么煊赫的人！”

languages.text: «¡Alto, en el nombre del señor!». {n}Un hombre pálido y demacrado que viste unas túnicas clericales os observa, pero unos instantes después se lanza de rodillas al suelo servilmente.{/n} «¡Su Excelencia! Disculpe mi vehemencia, nobilísim{mf|o|a} {name}. ¡No esperaba encontrarme con una eminencia en este rincón de Paso!».
languages.original_text: "Stop right there, in the name of the Liege!" {n}The gaunt, pale-skinned man in grimy clerical robes glances at you — and immediately falls to his knees obsequiously.{/n} "Your Excellency! Please forgive my vehemence, most noble {name} — I never expected to encounter such eminent persons in this corner of Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Alto, en el nombre del señor!». {n}Un hombre pálido y demacrado que viste unas túnicas clericales os observa, pero unos instantes después se lanza de rodillas al suelo servilmente.{/n} «¡Su Excelencia! Disculpe mi vehemencia, nobilísim{mf|o|a} {name}. ¡No esperaba encontrarme con una eminencia en este rincón de Paso!».

languages.text: 「領主の名において、そこを動くな！」{n}汚れた聖職用のローブを着た、痩せて青白い男がこちらをちらりと見た途端、高貴なものにするように膝をついた。{/n}「陛下！ 先ほどの態度をお許しください、高貴なる{name}様。フットフォールのこの片隅で、これほど名高いお方に会うとは思いもしませんでした！」
languages.original_text: "Stop right there, in the name of the Liege!" {n}The gaunt, pale-skinned man in grimy clerical robes glances at you — and immediately falls to his knees obsequiously.{/n} "Your Excellency! Please forgive my vehemence, most noble {name} — I never expected to encounter such eminent persons in this corner of Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: 「領主の名において、そこを動くな！」{n}汚れた聖職用のローブを着た、痩せて青白い男がこちらをちらりと見た途端、高貴なものにするように膝をついた。{/n}「陛下！ 先ほどの態度をお許しください、高貴なる{name}様。フットフォールのこの片隅で、これほど名高いお方に会うとは思いもしませんでした！」

languages.text: "Haltet sofort ein, im Namen des Lehnsherren!" {n}Der hagere, blasse Mann in schmutziger klerikaler Robe starrt dich an – und sinkt umgehend unterwürfig auf die Knie.{/n} "Eure Exzellenz! Bitte verzeiht meine Schroffheit, {mf|edelster|edelste} {name} – ich hätte nie erwartet, in dieser Ecke von Footfall derart wichtigen Persönlichkeiten zu begegnen!"
languages.original_text: "Stop right there, in the name of the Liege!" {n}The gaunt, pale-skinned man in grimy clerical robes glances at you — and immediately falls to his knees obsequiously.{/n} "Your Excellency! Please forgive my vehemence, most noble {name} — I never expected to encounter such eminent persons in this corner of Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: "Haltet sofort ein, im Namen des Lehnsherren!" {n}Der hagere, blasse Mann in schmutziger klerikaler Robe starrt dich an – und sinkt umgehend unterwürfig auf die Knie.{/n} "Eure Exzellenz! Bitte verzeiht meine Schroffheit, {mf|edelster|edelste} {name} – ich hätte nie erwartet, in dieser Ecke von Footfall derart wichtigen Persönlichkeiten zu begegnen!"

languages.text: « Arrêtez tout de suite, au nom du suzerain ! » {n}L'homme frêle et pâle dans sa tunique de clerc crasseuse vous jette un regard et tombe immédiatement à genoux avec servilité.{/n} « Votre Excellence ! Veuillez pardonner ma véhémence, noble {name}... Je n'aurais jamais cru croiser quelqu'un d'aussi important dans ce recoin de Castel ! »
languages.original_text: "Stop right there, in the name of the Liege!" {n}The gaunt, pale-skinned man in grimy clerical robes glances at you — and immediately falls to his knees obsequiously.{/n} "Your Excellency! Please forgive my vehemence, most noble {name} — I never expected to encounter such eminent persons in this corner of Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: « Arrêtez tout de suite, au nom du suzerain ! » {n}L'homme frêle et pâle dans sa tunique de clerc crasseuse vous jette un regard et tombe immédiatement à genoux avec servilité.{/n} « Votre Excellence ! Veuillez pardonner ma véhémence, noble {name}... Je n'aurais jamais cru croiser quelqu'un d'aussi important dans ce recoin de Castel ! »

languages.text: "Emîr adına olduğun yerde kal!" {n}Sıska, solgun tenli, kirli ruhban cübbeli adam sana bakıp derhâl itaatkâr bir şekilde dizlerinin üstüne çöküyor.{/n} "Ekselansları! Lütfen taşkınlığımı bağışlayın pek asil {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}. Binliman'ın bucağında böylesi seçkin kimselerle karşılaşmayı hiç beklemiyordum!"
languages.original_text: "Stop right there, in the name of the Liege!" {n}The gaunt, pale-skinned man in grimy clerical robes glances at you — and immediately falls to his knees obsequiously.{/n} "Your Excellency! Please forgive my vehemence, most noble {name} — I never expected to encounter such eminent persons in this corner of Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: "Emîr adına olduğun yerde kal!" {n}Sıska, solgun tenli, kirli cübbeli adam sana bakıyor ve derhâl itaatkâr bir şekilde dizlerinin üstüne çöküyor.{/n} "Ekselansları! Lütfen coşkumu bağışlayın pek asil {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}, Binliman'ın bucağında böylesi seçkin insanlarla karşılaşmayı hiç beklemiyordum!"
